## Project 1: Sustainability Reporting Analysis

This is a data-driven project exploring the trends of sustainability reporting and external auditing among S&P 500 companies.

You can view the interactive dashboard for this project here: [**Click to Open Dashboard**](flexboard.html)

**Project Description:**
The project analyzes data from the past decade to understand how major corporations are adopting sustainability practices. The visualization highlights a significant "reporting boom" and a growing preference for externally audited reports, suggesting a shift towards higher transparency and credibility in the corporate sector.
